name: The Ear- Mystery in Loures
description:
A Mystery that Started with a Ear in Loures

"The Ear- A Mystery in Loures" is a game made under a week for a university project.

Abel is a young man that is taking a walk on a forest in Loures, Portugal, looking for a sweet spot to release his intestines. But, suddenly, he finds a ear on the ground, which leads him on a quest to uncover the secrets of Loures.

Features

Explore the forest of Loures

Meet the quirky inhabitants of Loures

Gather Items to help you on your adventure

Solve the mysteries of this strange little town

Controls

WASD/ARROWS- Move

Z- Interact

X- Cancel

ENTER- Start

SHIFT- Select
